languages.text: Whenever the Overseer makes a successful attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free melee attack against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's turn, spending 0 MP) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: While the Apprehending Mastiff is near the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy, it makes a free melee attack against them each time the Overseer hits that enemy. It’s triggered by both melee and ranged attacks and also corresponding abilities. If the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}Apprehended{/g} enemy tries to retreat, the Mastiff makes a special melee attack that has a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel their movement.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.
languages.original_text: Whenever the Overseer makes a successful attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free melee attack against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes a successful attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde bu siber mastif, hedefe %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar. Hedef, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya teşebbüs ederse siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu hedefin hareketini iptal edebilir. Hedef, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu hedefi takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak) ona saldırır.

Hedef, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu hedefi takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak) ona saldırır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde bu siber mastif, hedefe %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir yakın dövüş saldırısı yapar. Hedef, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya teşebbüs ederse siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu hedefin hareketini iptal edebilir. Hedef, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu hedefi takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 HP harcayarak) ona saldırır.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} hedefe başarılı bir saldırı gerçekleştirdiğinde bu siber mastif, hedefe %50 daha az hasar veren serbest bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapar. Hedef, siber mastiften uzaklaşmaya teşebbüs ederse siber mastif, %{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} olasılıkla bu hedefin hareketini iptal edebilir. Hedef, siber mastiften 1 hücreden fazla uzaklaşırsa siber mastif, bu hedefi takip ederek (yaratığın {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} harcayarak) ona saldırır.

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque contra el objetivo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este cibermastín efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra él, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si el objetivo intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento del objetivo. Si el objetivo se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este le sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y le ataca.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque contra el objetivo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este cibermastín efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra él, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si el objetivo intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento del objetivo. Si el objetivo se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este le sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y le ataca.

Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} realiza un ataque con éxito contra el objetivo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, este cibermastín efectúa un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} gratuito contra él, infligiendo un −50 % menos de daño. Si el objetivo intenta alejarse del cibermastín, este tiene una probabilidad del {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de anular el movimiento del objetivo. Si el objetivo se aleja más de 1 casilla del cibermastín, este le sigue (durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} de esta criatura, gastando 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}) y le ataca.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}攻击被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的目标时，施加捕获状态的生化獒犬也会立刻进行一次无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。如果被捕获的目标试图远离生化獒犬，则生化獒犬有{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%的几率阻止目标移动。如果目标向远处移动，与生化獒犬之间的距离超过1格，生化獒犬会自动跟随该目标（在目标单位的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}），同时进行攻击。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}攻击被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的目标时，施加捕获状态的生化獒犬也会立刻进行一次无消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，造成的伤害降低50%。如果被捕获的目标试图远离生化獒犬，则生化獒犬有{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%的几率阻止目标移动。如果目标向远处移动，与生化獒犬之间的距离超过1格，生化獒犬会自动跟随该目标（在目标单位的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内移动，不消耗{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}），同时进行攻击。

languages.text: Greift der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} das {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gestellte{/g} Ziel an, hat dieser Cyber-Mastiff einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel, der −50 % weniger Schaden verursacht. Versucht das Ziel, sich vom Cyber-Mastiff zu entfernen, hat dieser eine Chance von {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} %, die Bewegung des Ziels zu unterbinden. Entfernt sich das Ziel mehr als 1 Feld vom Cyber-Mastiff, folgt ihm dieser (während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} dieses Ziels für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}) und attackiert es.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Greift der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} das {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gestellte{/g} Ziel an, hat dieser Cyber-Mastiff einen kostenlosen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel, der −50 % weniger Schaden verursacht. Versucht das Ziel, sich vom Cyber-Mastiff zu entfernen, hat dieser eine Chance von {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} %, die Bewegung des Ziels zu unterbinden. Entfernt sich das Ziel mehr als 1 Feld vom Cyber-Mastiff, folgt ihm dieser (während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} dieses Ziels für 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}) und attackiert es.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} touche l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g}, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite lui infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins. Si cette dernière tente de s'éloigner du cyber-mastiff, il gagne {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de chances d'annuler son déplacement. Si la cible s'éloigne de plus de 1 case du cyber-mastiff, il la suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et l'attaque.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} touche l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g}, le cyber-mastiff exécute une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} gratuite lui infligeant 50 % de dégâts en moins. Si cette dernière tente de s'éloigner du cyber-mastiff, il gagne {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575} % de chances d'annuler son déplacement. Si la cible s'éloigne de plus de 1 case du cyber-mastiff, il la suit immédiatement lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} sans dépenser de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et l'attaque.

languages.text: {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}が攻撃を成功させると、このサイバーマスチフは、ターゲットに対して自由な{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%の確率でターゲットの移動をキャンセルできる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間消費{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}は0）、攻撃する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes a successful attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットに対して監督者が攻撃を成功させると、このサイバーマスチフは、ターゲットに対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|Chance|078bea05041540fa87a53b93d639f243}%の確率でターゲットの移動をキャンセルできる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物のターンの間消費MPは0）、攻撃する。

{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}ターゲットに対して監督者が攻撃を成功させると、このサイバーマスチフは、ターゲットに対して自由な近接攻撃を行い、ダメージは−50%となる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから離れようとすると、サイバーマスチフは{uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%の確率でターゲットの移動をキャンセルできる。ターゲットがサイバーマスチフから1セル以上離れて移動すると、サイバーマスチフはそれに付いていき（この生物のターンの間消費MPは0）、攻撃する。

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} атакует {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}, кибермастиф атакует ее вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Если цель пытается отойти от кибермастифа, тот может прервать ее движение с шансом {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%. Если цель отдалилась от кибермастифа более чем на 1 клетку, тот следует за ней (в ход цели без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}) и атакует ее.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} makes an attack against the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} target, this cyber-mastiff makes a free {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against it, dealing −50% less damage. If the target attempts to move away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff gains a {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}% chance to cancel the target's movement. If the target moves further than 1 cell away from the cyber-mastiff, the cyber-mastiff follows (during this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, spending 0 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}) and attacks it.

traits.locale_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} атакует {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}, кибермастиф атакует ее вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Если цель пытается отойти от кибермастифа, тот может прервать ее движение с шансом {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%. Если цель отдалилась от кибермастифа более чем на 1 клетку, тот следует за ней (в ход цели без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}) и атакует ее.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} атакует {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цель захвата{/g}, кибермастиф атакует ее вне лимита атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, нанося урон, уменьшенный на 50%. Если цель пытается отойти от кибермастифа, тот может прервать ее движение с шансом {uip|StopChance|e16934c3dbf44cb997c684a6ddce7575}%. Если цель отдалилась от кибермастифа более чем на 1 клетку, тот следует за ней (в ход цели без затрат {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}) и атакует ее.
